title: The exception that is thrown when an application attempts to perform a networking operation on its main thread.

inline_content.Text: The exception that is thrown when an application attempts to perform a networking operation on its main thread.

title: This is only thrown for applications targeting the Honeycomb SDK or higher. Applications targeting earlier SDK versions are allowed to do networking on their main event loop threads, but it’s heavily discouraged.

inline_content.Text: This is only thrown for applications targeting the Honeycomb SDK or higher. Applications targeting earlier SDK versions are allowed to do networking on their main event loop threads, but it’s heavily discouraged.

title: To avoid this exception, your network operations must always run in a background task via an
AsyncTask
c
Thread
c
IntentService
c
, etc.
